input: A person with Costochondritis has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Costochondritis has a medication treatment because ataminophen (Tylenol, others) ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin IB, others) or naproxen sodium, topical pain relievers including creams, gels, patches and sprays helps reduce pain and symptoms

input: A person with Costochondritis has a/an therapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Costochondritis has a therapy treatment because Most patients get adequate relief with ice, heat, and gentle stretching and postural exercises

input: A person with Costochondritis has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Costochondritis has a surgery treatment because

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a medication treatment because nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs reduce pain and inflammation and disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs (DMARDs) curb your immune system to help slow RA or keep it from getting worse

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an therapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a therapy treatment because  physiotherapy helps rheumatoid patients with pain control, reducing inflammation and joint stiffness and to return to the normal activities of daily living or sports.

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a surgery treatment as the surgeon removes the inflamed synovial tissue around the joint to reduce or eliminate the patient's symptoms

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an regular exercise treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a/an regular exercise treatment because it helps reduce the disability often associated with rheumatoid arthritis and boosts strength and flexibility

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an heat or cold treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a heat or cold treatment because heat can relax muscles and helps lubricate joints, relieves muscle and joint stiffness, help warm up joints before activity, or ease a muscle spasm while cold can reduce inflammation, swelling, and pain

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an stress management treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a stress management treatment because the connection between stress and RA has been identified in numerous studies. An analysis of 16 studies, published in Arthritis Research & TherapyTrusted Source, found that stress tends to make RA symptoms worse.

input: A person with rheumatoid has a/an weight loss treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with rheumatoid has a weight loss treatment because if you are lean, you can ease pressure on your joints, reduce inflammation, and help you get around more easily. Weight loss improve health and alleviate the symptoms.

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an surgery treatment because surgeries like lobectomy removes the lobe containing the cancer and thyroidectomy removes the thyroid gland

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an thyroid hormone therapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a thyroid hormone therapy treatment because hormonal therapy is used to control TSH, which in turn helps prevent cancer cells from growing and reduce the risk of thyroid cancer coming back, or recurring.

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an radioactive iodine treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a radioactive iodine treatment because the radioactivity destroys the cancer cells. The radioactive iodine gives off radiation nearby and destroys the cancer cells over time.

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an alcohol ablation treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an alcohol ablation treatment because during an alcohol ablation for thyroid cancer, your doctor will use imaging guidance to inject a concentrated ethanol alcohol solution into the neck. The alcohol solution will cut off the blood supply to any malignant cells in the neck lymph nodes, causing them to die

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an radiation therapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a radiation therapy treatment because an external beam radiation therapy uses high energy rays (or particles) to destroy cancer cells or slow their growth

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an chemotherapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a chemotherapy treatment because Chemotherapy (chemo) uses anti-cancer drugs that are injected into a vein or are taken by mouth. Chemotherapy is systemic therapy, which means that the drug enters the bloodstream and travels throughout the body to reach and destroy cancer cells and stops cancer growth.

input: A person with thyroidcancer has a/an pallative care treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with thyroidcancer has a pallative care treatment because palliative care can improve the quality of life and help the patient feel more satisfied with the treatment received.

input: A person with depression has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has a medication treatment because It can effectively relieve spasms and has modest effects in improving performance antidepressant medications increase the activity of chemicals called neurotransmitters in the brain and  Increasing the activity of the neurotransmitters serotonin, norepinephrine and dopamine seems to help lessen the symptoms of depression and anxiety.

input: A person with depression has a/an psychotherapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has an psychotherapy treatment because it helps pinpoint life events that contribute to the depression and help find ways to change, accept or adapt to those situations.

input: A person with depression has a/an hospitalization treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has a hospitalization treatment because it helps the doctor can fine tune the depression medicine under the close supervision as well as prevent a possible suicide or violence

input: A person with depression has a/an avoid drugs and alcohol treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has an avoid drugs and alcohol treatment because substance abuse can trigger or intensify the feelings of loneliness, sadness and hopelessness often associated with depression

input: A person with depression has a/an healthy diet treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has a healthy diet treatment because a healthy, well-balanced diet can help us think clearly and feel more alert. Foods high in protein, fiber and complex carbohydrates have the best nutrients for fighting depression.

input: A person with depression has a/an regular exercise treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has a regular exercise treatment because regular exercise may help ease depression and anxiety by releasing feel good endorphins, natural cannabis like brain chemicals (endogenous cannabinoids) and other natural brain chemicals that can enhance your sense of well being.

input: A person with depression has a/an get enough sleep treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with depression has a get enough sleep treatment because when you're well rested, you will not only have more energy, but you may also have a more upbeat view on life and better focus

input: A person with depression has a/an stick to treatment plan treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: stickA person with depression has a stick to treatment plan treatment because the treatment can be an effective way to relieve sadness and other depression symptoms only if the patient take them regularly

input: A person with gerd has a/an don't smoke treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with gerd has a don't smoke treatment because research linked smoking to some of the worst complications of GERD, including Barrett's esophagus and throat cancer

input: A person with ErectileDysfunction has a/an regular exercise treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with ErectileDysfunction has a regular exercise treatment because regular exercise keeps blood flowing smoothly throughout the body and it is good for the circulatory system.

input: A person with CysticFibrosis has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with CysticFibrosis has n surgery treatment because options for certain conditions caused by cystic fibrosis include: Nasal and sinus surgery. Your doctor may recommend surgery to remove nasal polyps that obstruct breathing.

input: A person with ibs has a/an avoid certain foods treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with ibs has an avoid certain foods treatment because certain food like food contains too much fiber, food and drinks with chocolate, alcohol, caffeine, fructose, or sorbitol, Carbonated drinks, Large meals, Fried and fatty foods can make IBS related diarrhea worse

input: A person with Hyperhidrosis has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Hyperhidrosis has a medication treatment because anticholinergics medicines such as glycopyrrolate, oxybutynin, benztropine, propantheline etc are helping to prevent the stimulation of sweat glands and, thus, decreasing overall sweating.

input: A person with adhd has a/an meditation treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with adhd has a meditation treatment because meditation thickens your prefrontal cortex, a part of your brain that's involved in focus, planning, and impulse control. It also raises your brain's level of dopamine, which is in short supply in ADHD brains.

input: A person with ErectileDysfunction has a/an psychological counseling treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with ErectileDysfunction has a psychological counseling treatment because patients can develop balanced thoughts about themselves, their relationships, and sexual performance through psychological counseling

input: A person with parkinsons has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with parkinsons has a medication treatment because most people with Parkinson's disease eventually need a medication called levodopa which is absorbed by the nerve cells in your brain and turned into the chemical dopamine which transmits messages between the parts of the brain and nerves that control movement

input: A person with CrohnsDisease has a/an nutrition therapy treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with CrohnsDisease has a nutrition therapy treatment because without proper nutrients, the symptoms of the Crohn's disease can cause serious complications, including nutrient deficiencies, weight loss, and malnutrition

input: A person with Hyperhidrosis has a/an antiperspirant treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Hyperhidrosis has an antiperspirant treatment because antiperspirants contain aluminum based compounds that temporarily block the sweat pore which reduces the amount of sweat that reaches your skin

input: A person with dystonia has a/an stress management treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with dystonia has a stress management treatment because stress may bring on the symptoms or cause them to worsen

input: A person with bpd has a/an hospitalization treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with bpd has a hospitalization treatment because it keeps the person with BPD safe during a mental health crisis, get that person stabilized and provides with some individual or group psychotherapy, as well as helping medication management

input: A person with migraine has a/an acupuncture treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with migraine has an acupuncture treatment because acupuncture  needle points near nerves in your body  stimulates the nerves to release hormones, such as endorphins, that trigger a response from your body. This immune and circulation system stimulation is what proponents of acupuncture claim relieves migraines

input: A person with ptsd has a/an follow treatment plan treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with ptsd has a follow treatment plan treatment because after treatment the person will have learned skills to better cope with symptoms and improve their quality of life

input: A person with Sciatica has a/an medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Sciatica has a medication treatment because several ointments, gels, and creams can help relieve nerve pain by altering the blood flow, reducing inflammation, and creating a numbing effect.

input: A person with parkinsons has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with parkinsons has a surgery treatment because deep brain stimulation which is the most common surgical treatment for Parkinson's disease aims to help treat movement disorders involves using implanted electrodes to interrupt disorganized electrical signals in the brain that cause movement symptoms such as tremors

input: A person with Sciatica has a/an surgery treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Sciatica has a surgery treatment because micro discectomy is a common surgical approach used to treat sciatica that is caused by a lumbar disc herniation. In this surgery, a small part of the disc material under the nerve root and/or bone over the nerve root is taken out.

input: A person with Sinusitis has a/an sprays treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Sinusitis has a sprays treatment because nasal sprays help drainage of mucus from the nasal passages.

input: A person with Alzheimers has a/an healthy diet treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with Alzheimers has a healthy diet treatment because patients in the early to moderate stages of Alzheimer's disease could have their cognitive impairment slowed or even reversed by switching to a healthier diet

input: A person with acne has a/an topical medication treatment because/since/as {explanation}
output: A person with acne has a topical medication treatment because they reduce the number of acne-causing bacteria, make the skin dry, thus peeling off the dead skin cells and also inhibit sebum production (high amounts of sebum can lead to severe acne) and also help to reduce inflammation
